name: BeaverBother Beanroom
description:
A Magical adventure in the magical school of Beaverbother. Can you escape before they get you?

This game is for Decktember 2022 game jam, I was hoping to make it more advanced and have 3d rendered art however my ambitions outstripped my time management abilities which is why the art is... What it is.

This game was also heavily inspired by Fredrik Knudsens Loren character.

There might also be technical issues. There probably are technical issues in fact, but I'm out of gas now.

"Yo is that a reference to XYZ?"

Maybe?

There are some references to various streamers in there that I really didn't do justice in the implementation. And Beaverbother is a reference to another fictional magical school that could also be a cutesy name for a medical issue.
